pageContext.claim: “Police have killed white people -- in larger number, police have killed white people.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is spinning a falsehood by focusing on raw numbers. There are many more White people than there are Black people in the United States. But Black people are killed by police at a higher rate than White people. A recent study by Northeastern professor Matt Miller found that Black people are shot and killed by police at twice the rate that White people are.
